Sponsors

Sponsoring White Haven Community Football Club (WHCFC) means becoming a vital part of our mission to provide free football experiences and educational workshops to the community.
Your support enables us to foster inclusivity, teamwork, and personal development among individuals from diverse backgrounds.
As a sponsor, you'll gain visibility and recognition within the community, aligning your brand with a positive and impactful cause.
Join us in empowering the next generation and building a stronger, more connected community through the beautiful game.

DARK COLORS KITCHEN AND RENO

Dark Colors website displays the various projects completed, with visuals and testimonials. Work done includes renovation, kitchen cabinets, general contracting.
Complete Remodeling is what the company does best, and this means that they are also well equipped to do bathroom and kitchen remodeling and home Interior work. Also, Dark Colors will help a customer realize any ideas they have and bring them into reality. They are flexible too and can work based on any budget the customer has.
Inquiries are welcomed at sales@darkcolor.ca, or call the cell number for Dark Colors, 647-381-7379. Details are available on the website or by calling German at the above cell number.
